projects.Title: QuickCart
projects.Description: QuickCart – A Full-Stack E-commerce Platform with Advanced Shopping Cart, Order Management, and Seller Dashboard
Features: Complete e-commerce platform with buyer and seller roles
Advanced shopping cart with real-time quantity management
Secure authentication using Clerk with role-based access control
Product management system for sellers with image upload via Cloudinary
Order tracking and management with status updates
Address management system for multiple shipping addresses
Responsive design optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Background job processing using Inngest for order management
Real-time cart synchronization across sessions
Tax calculation and shipping fee management
Product search and filtering capabilities
Order history and tracking for customers

projects.Title: Next.js Portfolio Website
projects.Description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 14, featuring dark/light theme toggle, contact form, and beautiful UI design with authentication system
Features: Modern responsive design with dark/light theme toggle
Authentication system with NextAuth.js
Contact form with form validation
Portfolio showcase with project filtering
Blog section with article management
MongoDB integration for data persistence
SEO optimized with Next.js built-in features
Mobile-first responsive design
Image optimization with Next.js Image component
Context API for theme management

projects.Title: Movie App
projects.Description: A comprehensive mobile movie application built with React Native and Expo. Features an advanced search system with popularity tracking, real-time movie data fetching, and a modern UI designed with Tailwind CSS. The app includes trending movies, detailed movie information, and user engagement tracking through Appwrite backend services.
Features: Real-time movie data fetching from TMDB API
Advanced search functionality with popularity tracking
Trending movies section with engagement metrics
Detailed movie information and ratings
Modern UI with smooth animations and transitions
Responsive design for mobile and web platforms
User engagement tracking and analytics
Cross-platform compatibility (iOS, Android, Web)
TypeScript for type safety and better development experience
Tailwind CSS for consistent styling and rapid development
Appwrite backend integration for data persistence
Professional code architecture with reusable components

projects.Title: Recipe App
projects.Description: A comprehensive mobile recipe application built with React Native and Expo. Features real-time recipe search, category filtering, favorites management, and detailed recipe information. The app integrates with TheMealDB API for extensive recipe data, includes user authentication with Clerk, and features a modern UI with smooth animations. The backend is built with Node.js, Express, and Drizzle ORM with Neon database for user favorites persistence.
Features: Real-time recipe search with debounced input
Advanced search by recipe name and ingredients
Category-based recipe filtering and browsing
Featured recipe section with random selection
User authentication and profile management
Favorites system with persistent storage
Detailed recipe pages with ingredients and instructions
Modern UI with smooth animations and transitions
Pull-to-refresh functionality for updated content
Responsive design optimized for mobile devices
Cross-platform compatibility (iOS, Android)
Backend API with RESTful endpoints
Database integration for user favorites
Professional code architecture with reusable components
Error handling and loading states throughout the app

projects.Title: Manahel App
projects.Description: A mobile app designed to simplify charitable giving in Makkah. Users can easily request and donate services like water, Qurans, and meals directly from their smartphones.
Features: Easy in-app ordering of charitable services
Real-time execution tracking with media proof (images & videos)
Smooth and intuitive user experience
Fully responsive and mobile-optimized design
In-app dashboard for managing donations and requests
Option to customize services for specific occasions or recipients
Automatic recurring donation support

projects.Title: Manahel Web
projects.Description: A charitable web platform that empowers users to contribute to various acts of kindness in Makkah, such as water distribution, Quran donations, and meal services for pilgrims and visitors.
Features: Online ordering of charitable services (water, meals, Qurans)
Execution tracking with photo and video documentation
Secure and user-friendly donation process
Fully responsive design across all devices
Admin dashboard to manage orders and donations
Customizable services based on occasions or recipients
Support for recurring donations

projects.Title: Bjda
projects.Description: BJDA – A Specialized Platform for Booking Wedding Venues and Sending Invitations
Features: Online reservation for wedding halls and event venues
Search and filter by city, date, and hall type
Custom invitation design and QR code generation
Mobile-friendly interface for easy access on all devices
Integration with WhatsApp for sending invitations
Multilingual support (Arabic-focused UI)

projects.Title: Chate App
projects.Description: A simple mobile chat application built using React Native and Expo. It supports user authentication and real-time messaging via Firebase, offering a clean and intuitive chat experience. This project marked the beginning of my mobile development journey.
Features: User authentication via Firebase Authentication
Real-time messaging using Firebase Firestore
List of registered users with chat access
Clean and minimal chat interface
Built with Expo Router and react-hook-form
Responsive styling using NativeWind

projects.Title: Store App
projects.Description: A fully-featured mobile store application built using React Native and Expo. Designed with a smooth, visually appealing interface and robust functionality, the app supports multiple languages, currencies, themes, and a complete e-commerce experience across mobile and web platforms.
Features: Attractive and fluid UI with smooth transitions
Multilingual support: Arabic (RTL), English, and Turkish
Dynamic theme system: Light, Dark, or System-based
Multi-currency support: USD, EUR, GBP, TRY, SAR with automatic price conversion
Full authentication system: login, signup, and user data storage
Integrated shopping cart: add/remove items, adjust quantities, calculate total
Order system: view past orders, track status, and view full details
Personal profile page: edit settings, change language/currency/theme, share app
Welcome screen shown only on first launch
Responsive design compatible with both mobile and web
Built professionally using best practices in React Native and Expo

projects.Title: Fall-algharbiya
projects.Description: A multi-service platform offering integrated solutions in IT, safety systems, e-services, real estate, general contracting, and commercial brokerage.
Features: Integrated service modules for six business sectors
AI-powered technology solutions and mobile app integration
Custom web development with modern UI/UX design
E-service automation including digital transformation and government platform integration
Real estate tools for investment, marketing, and electronic contracts
Safety systems support including calibration, maintenance, and installations
Dynamic section-based navigation using Angular Router
